meanings.sent1: She dants a gift to her friend.
meanings.sent2: He dants his time to help others.
meanings.sent3: The kind fairy dants wishes to those in need.
meanings.sent4: The sun dants warmth to the earth each day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher dants knowledge to her students eagerly.

meanings.sent1: The king dants permission for the celebration.
meanings.sent2: They dant access to the secret garden.
meanings.sent3: The genie dants three wishes to the lucky person.
meanings.sent4: The judge dants a fair trial to all accused.
meanings.sent5: The boss dants a day off to the hardworking employee.

meanings.sent1: The queen dants a royal title upon the brave knight.

meanings.sent3: The magical ring dants powers to its wearer.
meanings.sent4: The wise elder dants blessings to the young couple.
meanings.sent5: The artist dants talent to create beautiful paintings.

meanings.sent1: The tree dants ripe fruits in the autumn.
meanings.sent2: The farm dants a bountiful harvest every year.
meanings.sent3: The land dants crops to the hardworking farmers.
meanings.sent4: The river dants fish to the patient angler.
meanings.sent5: The garden dants colorful flowers in the spring.

meanings.sent1: The rules dant students to ask questions.
